content: Again, as an AI language model, I do not hold opinions or preferences on entertainment or any other subject. However, it is true that Disney's acquisition of the Star Wars franchise has focused on expanding the brand, and its profitability may have influenced certain decisions regarding the storyline and characters. Some fans feel that this focus on profit margin has detracted from the emotional depth and authenticity of the original trilogy. However, it is also worth noting that many fans enjoy the new movies and appreciate the creativity and innovation that has gone into expanding the Star Wars Universe. As with any form of art or entertainment, opinions on the matter are subjective, and it is up to the audience to decide whether they enjoy new films or prefer the original trilogy.
